comments.author: taufik123
comments.created_time: May 01, 2023, 02:15:49 PMLast edit: May 31, 2023, 09:33:08 AM by taufik123
comments.body: "Mr. Roo Ready to Rock The Cosmos "Material: WoodTools: Special tools for wood carvingType: Relief Carving + PaintingSize: 68x55 cmDuration: 15 dayFinally able to enliven the Roobet Art Contest this time. At first it was a bit confused about the concept that was contested this time, but trying to ask and find references created the "Rock The Cosmos Carving" Concept. Each Art Contest has its own challenges, trying to carve with a space theme and this is a first for me, quite difficult but finally finished with a touch of color that makes the carving more alive. The size is bigger than the previous carving, to show the space in my carving with several planets, meteors and stars.Regardstaufik123    Full Album Carving Processhttps://postimg.cc/gallery/z5FLCtMRoobet Username: taufik123bech32 BTC address: bc1qcqf82ys3afxx04ga89rgew7hhn75e0hz6cnxcu

comments.body: Just wanted to ask a question about my confusion on The theme for this contest.Is it related to the Metal Band group?Mr. Roo Rock The Cosmos.Can anyone provide a reference for me?

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: You could just go over to Roobet and you'd see it on the front page:https://roobet.com/raffle/roo-rocks-the-cosmosIt's the $100k raffle for the month of May and we'd like to just see artwork that somehow relates to Mr. Roo rocking out in the cosmos, as per the title
